text: (ai rasool) tumase log poonchhate hain ki kaun (kaun) cheez unake lie halaal kee gayee hai tum (unase) kah do ki tumhaare lie paakeeza cheejen halaal kee gayeen aur shikaaree jaanavar jo tumane shikaar ke lie sadha rakhen hai aur jo (tareeke) khuda ne tumhen bataaye hain unamen ke kuchh tumane un jaanavaron ko bhee sikhaaya ho to ye shikaaree jaanavar jis shikaar ko tumhaare lie pakad rakhen usako (betaammul) khao aur (jaanavar ko chhondate vakt) khuda ka naam le liya karo aur khuda se darate raho (kyonki) isamen to shak hee nahin ki khuda bahut jald hisaab lene vaala hai
